item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Fix broken update packages for windows and osx (it's embarrasing... now let's move on) * Fix update progress indicator * Add overlay loop queue logic (performance optimization) CHANGES FROM v1.6: * Add chinese translation (thanks to Windmill-City) * Switch to custom noto font * UI readjusted due to new font * Add mod collection file hash verification (intended use case is for MP gameplay) * Add option to not close Irony after launching game (per game setting)
